data.title: Andras Andrew I Arpad "The White or The Catholic" King of HUNGARY (1014
data.meta_description: Andras Andrew I Arpad "The White or The Catholic" King of HUNGARY was born in the year 1014 in Esztergom, Komarom-Esztergom, Hungary, son of András I "Andrew Endre" Árpádházi (Arpadhazi) and Anastasia (Анастасия Ярославна) Yaroslavna (Киевская). He was married in the year 1037 in Esztergom, Komarom-Esztergom, Hungary to Анастасия Ярославна (Anastasia) Киевская (Yaroslavna) of Kiev, they had 2 children. He was married in the year 1039 in Esztergom, Komarom-Esztergom, Hungary to Yelisaveta (Elizabeth) of Kiev. He died on July  6, 1060 in Veszprem, Hungary. This information is part of Richard and Charlotte Allen Cosby Ancestry by Richard Cosby on Genealogy Online.
data.text:
Personal data Andras Andrew I Arpad "The White or The Catholic" King of HUNGARY

Source 1

Alternative names: András Árpádházi (Arpadhazi) I, Andras Andrew Arpad "The White or The Catholic" King of Hungary I

He was born in the year 1014 in Esztergom, Komarom-Esztergom, Hungary .

He died on July 6, 1060 in Veszprem, Hungary , he was 46 years old.

Alternative: He died on July 6, 1060 in Zircz, Veszprem, Hungary, he was 46 years old.

A child of András I "Andrew Endre" Árpádházi (Arpadhazi) and Anastasia (Анастасия Ярославна) Yaroslavna (Киевская)

Household of Andras Andrew I Arpad "The White or The Catholic" King of HUNGARY

(1) He is married to Анастасия Ярославна (Anastasia) Киевская (Yaroslavna) of Kiev.

They got married in the year 1037 at Esztergom, Komarom-Esztergom, Hungary, he was 23 years old.

Child(ren):

(2) He is married to Yelisaveta (Elizabeth) of Kiev.

They got married in the year 1039 at Esztergom, Komarom-Esztergom, Hungary, he was 25 years old.
